SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.status, GROUP_CONCAT(r.NAME) AS role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.STATUS = 1
AND u.username like concat('%', #{user.username}, '%')
AND u.email like concat('%', #{user.email}, '%')
AND u.phone like concat('%', #{user.phone}, '%')
GROUP BY u.id order by u.create_time desc;
